db:info.db:title: Qt Wayland Compositor Examples - Overview Compositor

db:abstract.db:para: Overview Compositor shows how to switch between clients in a grid.

db:article.db:programlisting:
QT += gui qml
SOURCES += \ main.cpp
OTHER_FILES = \ main.qml
RESOURCES += overview-compositor.qrc
target.path = $$[QT_INSTALL_EXAMPLES]/wayland/overview-compositor sources.files = $$SOURCES $$HEADERS $$RESOURCES $$FORMS overview-compositor.pro sources.path = $$[QT_INSTALL_EXAMPLES]/wayland/overview-compositor INSTALLS += target sources
